body:
I Tied to install some packages with these commands
spack install zlib

spack install berkeley-db-18.1.40

the log error for Zlib is

`==> zlib: Executing phase: 'install'

==> [2021-04-27-11:33:35.419240] './configure' '--prefix=/homes/orionsan/cdelv/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora26-westmere/gcc-9.2.0/zlib-$

Compiler error reporting is too harsh for ./configure (perhaps remove -Werror).

** ./configure aborting.
´

The log error for Berkeley is

configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
Mycompilers .yaml file:

`- compiler:

spec: gcc@7.3.1

paths:

  cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc

  cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++

  f77: /usr/bin/gfortran

  fc: /usr/bin/gfortran

flags: {}

operating_system: fedora26

target: x86_64

modules: []

environment: {}

extra_rpaths: []
compiler:

spec: gcc@9.2.0

paths:

cc: /usr/local/gcc-9.2/bin/gcc-9.2

cxx: /usr/local/gcc-9.2/bin/g++-9.2

f77: /usr/local/gcc-9.2/bin/gfortran-9.2
`
title: Installation issue: Spack doesn't work well on cluster
